MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH6 area of Flint affecting properties on Chester Road, Park Avenue and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at 11:45am. Our engineers have arrived at the local substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:34pm on 2nd February 2021
